content:
# We have successfully gathered another 10 coal and have a total of 10 iron ore in our inventory. 
# We can now set up our furnaces again for smelting.

# Step 26: Insert coal and iron ore into furnace 1 for smelting.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace1, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 coal into the first furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace1, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 iron ore into the first furnace.

# Step 27: Additionally, set up the second furnace for smelting as well.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace2, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 coal into the second furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace2, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 iron ore into the second furnace.

# Check the current status of the entities and inventory.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Display the current state of entities on the map.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Display updated inventory.
